data.sunServiceSchema:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<ServicesConfiguration><Service name="iPlanetAMPolicyService" version="1.0"><Schema i18nFileName="amPolicy"  i18nKey="iplanet-policy-service-name"  revisionNumber="60"  serviceVersion="4b5a2caf-15b6-452b-a855-82d17ba6e616" >

            <Organization hideConfigUI="no" >
                <SubSchema hideConfigUI="no"  inheritance="multiple"  maintainPriority="no"  name="Policies"  realmCloneable="yes"  supportsApplicableOrganization="no"  validate="yes" >
                    <SubSchema hideConfigUI="no"  inheritance="multiple"  maintainPriority="no"  name="NamedPolicy"  realmCloneable="yes"  supportsApplicableOrganization="no"  validate="yes" >
                        <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="xmlpolicy"  syntax="xml"  type="single" ></AttributeSchema>
                    </SubSchema>
                </SubSchema>

                <SubSchema hideConfigUI="no"  inheritance="multiple"  maintainPriority="no"  name="Resources"  realmCloneable="yes"  supportsApplicableOrganization="no"  validate="yes" >
                    <SubSchema hideConfigUI="no"  inheritance="multiple"  maintainPriority="no"  name="ServiceType"  realmCloneable="yes"  supportsApplicableOrganization="no"  validate="yes" >
                        <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="xmlresources"  syntax="xml"  type="single" ></AttributeSchema>
                        <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="resourceprefixes"  syntax="xml"  type="list" ></AttributeSchema>
                    </SubSchema>
                </SubSchema>

                <SubSchema hideConfigUI="no"  inheritance="single"  maintainPriority="no"  name="RealmSubjects"  realmCloneable="yes"  supportsApplicableOrganization="no"  validate="yes" >
                    <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="xmlRealmSubjects"  syntax="xml"  type="single" ></AttributeSchema>
                </SubSchema>

            </Organization>

            <PluginInterface i18nKey="iplanet-policy-resource-interface-name"  interface="com.sun.identity.policy.interfaces.ResourceName"  name="ResourceName" ></PluginInterface>
            <PluginInterface i18nKey="iplanet-policy-referral-interface-name"  interface="com.sun.identity.policy.interfaces.Referral"  name="Referral" ></PluginInterface>
            <PluginInterface i18nKey="iplanet-policy-subject-interface-name"  interface="com.sun.identity.policy.interfaces.Subject"  name="Subject" ></PluginInterface>
            <PluginInterface i18nKey="iplanet-policy-condition-interface-name"  interface="com.sun.identity.policy.interfaces.Condition"  name="Condition" ></PluginInterface>
            <PluginInterface i18nKey="iplanet-policy-responseprovider-name"  interface="com.sun.identity.policy.interfaces.ResponseProvider"  name="ResponseProvider" ></PluginInterface>
        </Schema></Service></ServicesConfiguration>
